nodes.text: The 15th Deep Core Reserve Fleet was a unit in the Imperial Navy.
Kentor Sarne served with this reserve fleet aboard the corvette Renegade. Malfkla Yzu served as an admiral in the fleet.

During the Galactic Civil War, the fleet conducted customs patrols around Empress Teta, to combat smuggling and piracy in the region. Additionally, the fleet had established a hyperspace interdiction checkpoint along the Koros Trunk Line to prevent unauthorized access to the Deep Core.
